results.name: Maize

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above, 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 460 GTX | AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above, 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Drive

results.short_description:
Maize is an indie adventure game developed by Finish Line Games. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Finish Line Games. Maize has a Metascore of 65, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Maize on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. The game is sold via PlayStation Store, Xbox Store, GOG and Steam. 
It was produced by Finish Line Games.

Palladium: Adventure in Greece is available on Linux, macOS and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

results.short_description:
House of Caravan is a casual, action, adventure and RPG game developed by Rosebud Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Rosebud Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip". 
House of Caravan is available on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on Steam.

The Grand Canyon VR Experience is a casual adventure-simulation game developed by Immersive Entertainment, Inc.. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Immersive Entertainment, Inc. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
The Grand Canyon VR Experience is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad Air Cellular, iPad Mini Retina, iPad Mini Retina Cellular, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 2 Cellular, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Sixth Gen, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Mini 4, iPad Mini 4 Cellular, iPad Pro, iPad Pro Cellular, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Pro 9.7 Cellular, iPhone SE, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad 6 1 1, iPad 6 1 2, iPad 7 1, iPad 7 2, iPad 7 3, iPad 7 4, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 7 5, iPad 7 6, iPhone X S, iPhone X S Max, iPhone X R, iPad 8 1 2, iPad 8 3 4, iPad 8 5 6, iPad 8 7 8, iPad Mini 5, iPad Mini 5 Cellular, iPad Air 3, iPad Air 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Seventh Gen, iPhone 1 1, iPhone 1 1 Pro, iPad Seventh Gen, iPad Seventh Gen Cellular, iPhone 1 1 Pro Max

results.short_description:
OVIVO is a casual, action, adventure and arcade game developed by Sometimes You, IzHard and Evgeniy Kolpakov t/a Sometimes You. It came out on 12-05-2017. Alex Vilassak published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, OVIVO has a score of 71. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
OVIVO is available on macOS, PC, iOS and Nintendo Switch. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop, App Store, Xbox Store and PlayStation Store.

results.short_description:
ENKI is an indie adventure game developed by Storm in a Teacup. It came out on 31-07-2015. It was published by SOEDESCO Publishing. On review aggregator Metacritic, ENKI has a score of 43. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG. 
ENKI is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

seo_text: If you want to find games like Golem, we've got you covered. This is a list of games similar to Golem. If you are looking for something like that, you'll likely enjoy some of these games.
